element.name: Group
element.description: RWT Group controls. Groups are labeled boxes used to group sets of controls.

property.name: background-color
property.description: Background color for group boxes.

property.name: color
property.description: Text color for group boxes.

property.name: font
property.description: Font for group boxes. Applied to the group box label.

property.name: border
property.description: The border that is drawn around group boxes.

property.name: border-top
property.description: The top side border for group boxes.

property.name: border-right
property.description: The right side border for group boxes.

property.name: border-bottom
property.description: The bottom side border for group boxes.

property.name: border-left
property.description: The left side border for group boxes.

style.name: BORDER
style.description: Indicates that the group box should have a border.

style.name: RIGHT_TO_LEFT
style.description: Indicates that the group is oriented right to left.

element.name: Group-Frame
element.description: The frame that contains the child controls.

property.name: border
property.description: The border that is drawn for group box frames.

property.name: border-top
property.description: The top side border for group box frames.

property.name: border-right
property.description: The right side border for group box frames.

property.name: border-bottom
property.description: The bottom side border for group box frames.

property.name: border-left
property.description: The left side border for group box frames.

property.name: border-radius
property.description: Border radius. The border radius has no effect if an enhanced border, like "inset" or "outset" is used.

property.name: margin
property.description: Margin for group box frames (outer space around the frame).

property.name: padding
property.description: Padding for group box frames (inner distance between frame border and content).

state.name: hover
state.description: Applies while the cursor hovers over the group box frame.

state.name: disabled
state.description: Applies to the frame of a disabled group box.

element.name: Group-Label
element.description: The label of a group box.

property.name: border
property.description: The border that is drawn around group box label.

property.name: border-top
property.description: The top side border for group box label.

property.name: border-right
property.description: The right side border for group box label.

property.name: border-bottom
property.description: The bottom side border for group box label.

property.name: border-left
property.description: The left side border for group box label.

property.name: border-radius
property.description: Border radius. The border radius has no effect if an enhanced border, like "inset" or "outset" is used.

property.name: padding
property.description: Padding for group box labels (space around the label text).

property.name: margin
property.description: Margin for group box labels (offset of the group box label).

property.name: background-image
property.description: Background image for group box label.

property.name: background-position
property.description: Background image position for group box label.

property.name: background-repeat
property.description: Background image repetition for group box label.

property.name: background-color
property.description: Background color for group box label (override the color set by Group#setBackgroundColor()).

property.name: color
property.description: Text color for group box label (override the color set by Group#setForegroundColor()).

property.name: text-shadow
property.description: Shadow for text.

state.name: hover
state.description: Applies while the cursor hovers over the group box label.
